gen:link.label:label: BV685: The item "Equities" reported in the template S.02.01 - Balance sheet should be equal to the total "Equities" that are not held in index-linked and unit-linked contracts and are not participations reported in template S.06.02 - List of assets (CIC '##3#' and excluding participations). -->Template 1: S.02.01; Template 2: S.06.02; Filter: {S.06.02, c0290} like '##3#' and {S.06.02, c0310}=[s2c_PU:x16] and {S.06.02, c0090}=[s2c_LB:x91]; Expression: {S.02.01, r0100,c0010}=sum({S.06.02, c0170,(sNNN)})

BV685: The item "Equities" reported in the template S.02.01 - Balance sheet should be equal to the total "Equities" that are not held in index-linked and unit-linked contracts and are not participations reported in template S.06.02 - List of assets (CIC '##3#' and excluding participations). -->Template 1: S.02.01; Template 2: S.06.02; Filter: {S.06.02, c0290} like '##3#' and {S.06.02, c0310}=[s2c_PU:x16] and {S.06.02, c0090}=[s2c_LB:x91]; Expression: {S.02.01, r0100,c0010}=sum({S.06.02, c0170,(sNNN)})
